aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text: I'm a passionate software developer with over 5 years of experience in creating innovative web solutions. My journey into development began in my teenage years when I discovered the power of programming and started building my own websites. Since then, I've developed skills in various technologies including JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Python. I enjoy tackling complex problems and am always seeking new challenges to improve my skills. In my free time, I like to contribute to open-source projects and explore new technological trends. I'm committed to continuous learning and believe that collaboration and knowledge sharing are key to growth in the tech industry.
